short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to fix UI errors in Hue

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For some versions of Hue, an error occurs if you try to browse a executed Oozie workflow.
This extension will fix this problem.
If you try to access the old link (with oozie/list_oozie_workflow in url), it will fix the link to the new format, and redirect you to this correct page.
